snippet.title: Brothers: A Tale of Two Sons - Nintendo Switch Pre-order Trailer (PEGI)
snippet.description:
Brothers is an award-winning adventure game and the Nintendo Switch version will introduce an all-new two-player mode! Guide two brothers on an epic fairytale journey from visionary Swedish film director Josef Fares. Control both brothers at once as you experience co-op play in single-player – or team up with a friend through the heartfelt story. Solve puzzles, explore stunning locations, and face off against harrowing bosses. This is one journey you will never forget.

Brothers is rated PEGI 16 and available now for pre-order here depending on your region:

UK: http://bit.ly/BrothersPOUK
NA: http://bit.ly/BrothersPOUS
FR: http://bit.ly/BrothersPOFR
DE: http://bit.ly/BrothersPODE
IT: http://bit.ly/BrothersPOIT
ES: http://bit.ly/BrothersPOES

For more information on Brothers, please visit: http://www.505games.com or follow the Brothers community at: 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/BrothersTheGame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BrothersTheGameOfficial/ 

For behind the scenes details on all of 505's games, head to the official 505 Games channels:

Blog: http://www.505games.com/blog
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/505Games
Twitter: https://twitter.com/505_Games
